Oh shit son!
There's nine other states scheduling appeals on gay marriage.

Why is this important?  Well gay marriage is legalized in 24 states; expected by a month or two 30 states; 9 appeals in the works.

Tl:dr; gay marriage may be legal in 39 states by mid-2015.
